steps.step: Step back left to 4:30 into a right forward bow. Simultaneously, execute a right outward hand sword to your opponent's left wrist and a left outward hand sword to the side of their neck.
Pivot to a right neutral bow as you strike the back of your opponent's neck with a right inward hand sword.
Pivot into a left foward bow (facing 4:30) with a right uppercut under the arm (breaking their elbow against your bicep).
Execute a right back knuckle to the floating ribs and a right scoop kick to the groin.
Plant your right foot back into a left forward bow as you perform a right chopping punch to your opponent's head. Your right leg is kicking out your opponent's leg, causing them to fall as you punch.
